after.description: The string to replace matches with.

sourceLocale.description: Required locale code that messages in the source code are written in.

targetLocales.description: Required locale codes that messages will be localized to.

tsConfig.description:
Path to a tsconfig.json file that describes the TypeScript source files
from which messages will be extracted.

tsOut.description:
Required path to the directory where generated TypeScript files will be
written.

xlbDir.description: Required path to the directory where generated XLB files will be written.
